ygData.subject: RE: dual weild
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not a bug... IIRC the minute you attain 17th (or is it 18th) you immediately have 20+ dual wield skill already.  IMO, there is no need to put any points
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Jamie Furtner <jfurtner@...>
>
> Having gotten my 17th song recently, I can say that I put no
> points into my
> dual wield at all, I just tried wielding a Dagger in my off
> hand and that
> worked fine.
>
> The odd part was that my first improve message was to 36, so I wonder
> if that's a bug, of if punching brings it up somehow, too.

Not a bug... IIRC the minute you attain 17th (or is it 18th) you immediately
have 20+ dual wield skill already. IMO, there is no need to put any points
into it.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 32 Bard [Povar]
